events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on our career portal.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience and submitted resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering profiles has been assigned to manage this candidate's application and coordinate the next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their software development background and motivation for the role.
The candidate promptly responded, expressing enthusiasm for the position and confirming availability for further interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to evaluate the candidate's software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
